user.title: Set up the Geofency Webhook
user.description: Are you sure you want to set up the Geofency Webhook?

abort.one_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is necessary.
abort.not_internet_accessible: Your Home Assistant instance needs to be accessible from the internet to receive messages from Geofency.

create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to setup the webhook feature in Geofency.

Fill in the following info:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.
